entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:35 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 3:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Ice pellets or periods of snow beginning this evening then changing to periods of snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow mixed with ice pellets early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
